author: Albert Einstein
message: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.

author: Buddha
message: Every human being is the author of his own health or disease.

author: Mark Twain
message: When in doubt, tell the truth.

author: John Dewey
message: Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of the imagination.
